response.overview: "A hundred scumbags deserve a hundred poetic downfalls!"  Jade, a brilliant woman scarred by toxic love, vows to purge the world of its "scumbags" through vigilante justice. She recruits her squad: He Nügui, a psychiatrist prodigy; AK, a martial arts goddess; and BOBO, a hacker savant—forming the Apocalypse Agency. Together, they accept "Scumbag Bounties", delivering karmic retribution with surgical precision.  Case 1: The Human Teddy  Womanizer Ouyang is gaslit into believing he’s terminally ill, tormented by a sleazy TCM quack’s ominous hints until his libido becomes his prison.  Case 2: The Wolf in Scholar’s Clothing  Bai Shuping, a wife-beating hypocrite, undergoes hypnotic conditioning that triggers humiliating public meltdowns whenever his rage flares.  Case 3: The Mr. Perfect Facade  When Gary’s wife exposes his mistress, the team orchestrates a fake kidnapping/birthday surprise to unmask his infidelity—only to unravel a twist darker than betrayal itself.
response.title: Punishment for Douchebag
